Generate a Valiterm definition

Use the prompt below with your preferred AI. Paste your product/page text where indicated, and follow the simulation loop.

What happens next?

  1. Run the prompt, review the first draft.
  2. Ask the AI to simulate questions your customers would ask and verify the answers.
  3. Iterate until you’re satisfied.
  4. Embed the script/JSON-LD on your page (HowTo guide below).
